forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle breeze carries the vibrant clarity of the day. The sun shines brightly, painting the city in warm hues, while the high temperature dances around a comfortable 68 degrees. As afternoon unfolds, a slight dip to 66 will not tarnish this splendid weather. Fuzzy edges of the marine layer, usually a hallmark of these spring days, remain distant today, allowing for a breathtaking view of the bay and the iconic Golden Gate Bridge off in the horizon—an unbroken canvas where the cobalt sky meets the shimmering waters below.

As evening approaches, the charm of the city transforms subtly; temperatures will retreat to a cool 51 under partly cloudy skies. The wind, whispering at a calm pace, will keep the air fresh and invigorating. It’s an ideal moment for a leisurely stroll through the streets, perhaps indulging in a quiet café visit or enjoying the company of friends over a light meal with views that stretch across the bay. Dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater over a t-shirt will capture the essence of these ambivalent, yet enchanting spring days. The city's allure, coupled with this fine weather, creates an invitation to savor both the moment and the surroundings around you.
